name: Animals Fight
description:
Animals Fight is an entertaining fighting game. In this game you will find beautiful battles and duels in which you can fight with animals. Engage in intense melee combat in Animals Fight and become the king of the martial arts!

In this spectacular fighting game, you will play the role of a fighting monkey. The monkey loves ultimate fighting! Fight with all animals, namely a toad, a cat and even a crocodile! Defeat them all and stand on the podium of the winners!

UNIQUE WORLD
In the new Animals Fight game, you will find yourself in the role of a fighting monkey, where its strength and danger are inseparable from each other.

ADVANCED GRAPHICS AND GAMEPLAY
Animals Fight has very beautiful graphics and catchy gameplay!
